<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fearless Sash](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2311)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 146 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 325 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn belt

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A feeling of security radiates out from this sash made of fine yellow fabric. You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68).

<document level="2" id="action-1860" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Fearless Sash
